title: 1960s TV Sci-Fi & Fantasy
description: From The Twilight Zone to Star Trek, the 1960s brought incredible science fiction and fantasy to television!

questions.question: Who created and hosted 'The Twilight Zone'?
What was the name of the starship on the original 'Star Trek'?
Which 1960s show featured a family stranded in space with a robot that warned 'Danger, Will Robinson!'?
options: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea

questions.question: On 'The Twilight Zone', what did the famous episode 'To Serve Man' reveal about the alien book's title?
Who played Captain Kirk on the original 'Star Trek' series?
Which show featured a scientist and a time traveler trapped in different historical periods?
options: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea

questions.question: What was Mr. Spock's home planet on 'Star Trek'?
Which 1960s sci-fi anthology series competed with 'The Twilight Zone' and opened with the line 'There is nothing wrong with your television set'?
On 'Bewitched', what did Samantha do to cast her spells?
Which 1960s show featured a Martian who could levitate and read minds, living with a newspaper reporter?
Who played the Martian Uncle Martin on 'My Favorite Martian'?
Which 1960s adventure series featured Admiral Harriman Nelson aboard a futuristic submarine?
options: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea

questions.question: On 'The Munsters', which classic movie monster was Herman Munster modeled after?
Which David Hedison-starring show featured a man who could shrink to miniature size?
options: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea

questions.question: Which Irwin Allen show featured travelers stranded on a planet where everything was twelve times normal size?
options: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
